author: adrianc
msg: Removed the "embedded relation cache" from GenericValue because it is a bad idea and doesn't work. There was no code to keep the embedded cache current as the GenericValue's fields changed - so the cache contents are guaranteed to be invalid (stale).
If we want to improve the performance of relation lookups, then there are better ways to do it.
